description: A double bed with a wooden frame and pale-pink floral bedding

core:description.text: A double bed raised slightly on a simple wooden frame. It's neatly made with layered bedding: a pale-pink quilt decorated with floral patterns covers the mattress, complemented by matching pillows arranged against the headboard. A folded blanket lies squarely across the foot of the bed.

core:portrait.altText: A neatly made double bed with a wooden frame and pale-pink floral bedding
